original_text:
they open wide their mouths at me,
    like a ravening and roaring lion.
korean_text: 내게 그 입을 벌림이 찢으며 부르짖는 사자 같으니이다

sentences.original_text: they open wide their mouths at me
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 나를 향해 입을 크게 벌린다.

sentences.original_text: like a ravening and roaring lion.
